alert.note: Alert for Henry; Oldham; Shelby (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:28AM EDT until April 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Oldham County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Shelby County in central Kentucky... Henry County in central Kentucky... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 127 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of New Castle to 7 miles south of La Grange, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... New Castle around 140 AM EDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
